TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CustomValidator extends System.Web.UI.MobileControls.BaseValidator

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

summary.span: 提供可对另一控件执行自定义验证的控件。

span.span: Provides a control that can perform custom validation against another control.

summary.span: 有关如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类的行为相同与Web 服务器控件。This class behaves identically to the Web server control. 开发人员可以选择他们自己的公共语言运行时委托用于进行验证。Developers can choose their own common language runtime delegate to use for validation. 默认情况下，窗体上的控件引发窗体以在窗体提交到服务器时执行验证的验证程序事件。By default, controls on a form raise validator events on the form to perform validation when the form is submitted to the server. 若要禁用自动验证，设置属性控件添加到`false`。To disable automatic validation, set the property on the controls to `false`. ## Examples 下面的示例检查是否用户放入的值控件是偶数。The following example checks whether the value that a user places into the control is an even number. 如果值为偶数，该页面也有效。If the value is an even number, then the page is valid. 如果不是的页面不是有效的与显示属性。If not, the page is not valid, and the displays the property. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileCustomValidatorSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileCustomValidatorSample/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileCustomValidatorSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileCustomValidatorSample/vb/Default.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果与此事件注册一个方法，它使用的值调用属性。If a method is registered with this event, it is called with the value of the property. 验证成功，仅当此事件处理程序返回`true`。Validation succeeds only if this event handler returns `true`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何捕获事件，以添加逻辑以验证页。The following example demonstrates how to trap the event to add logic to validate the page. [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileCustomValidatorSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileCustomValidatorSample/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileCustomValidatorSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileCustomValidatorSample/vb/Default.aspx#1)]
